description: This file defines a RecyclerView adapter for displaying categories with counts in an Android app. It includes a ViewHolder class, a diff utility object, and the adapter class itself, facilitating the display and deletion of categories.

classes.name: CategoriesAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView adapter for displaying CategoryWithCount items with delete functionality.

classes.name: CatDiff
classes.description: DiffUtil.ItemCallback implementation for efficiently computing list differences for CategoryWithCount items.

classes.name: CategoryViewHolder
classes.description: ViewHolder for binding a CategoryWithCount to the item view, including handling delete button clicks.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item layout and creates a CategoryViewHolder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds a CategoryWithCount item to the ViewHolder.

methods.name: areItemsTheSame
methods.description: Checks if two CategoryWithCount items represent the same item (by id).

methods.name: areContentsTheSame
methods.description: Checks if the content of two CategoryWithCount items are the same.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds a CategoryWithCount data to the ViewHolder's UI elements.
